backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining provinces, retailers, products, and product requests with CRUD-style methods for adding and querying data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten collection of short summaries for key frontend files, describing their roles in layout, pages, hooks, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables for the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing the root div and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and React Query provider for all shop pages.
frontend/src/components/shop/catalog/use: React hook handling search, category filtering, and price sorting for product lists.
Footer component showing attribution text and links styled with theme colors.
Header with logo, slogan, and navigation buttons for shop and request pages.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopLanding: Hero section for the landing page with branding text and a themed illustration.
Layout wrapper combining header, main content region, and footer for shop pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and offering login and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for provinces, retailers, product catalogs, and submitting new product requests via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and theme variables for light and dark modes with custom colors and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductDetailPag: Displays product details by retailer and product ID, with loading states and navigation back to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProvinceListPage: Shows a list of provinces fetched from the backend with loading and error states, allowing navigation to a province page.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RequestNewProduc: Provides a form for users to request new products or retailers, including validation, submission, and success feedback.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerCatalogP: Displays a retailerâ€™s product catalog with search, category filters, sorting, and navigation to product detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerListPage: Shows retailers for a selected town/suburb with loading/error states and navigation to retailer detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/shop/TownSuburbListPa: Lists towns/suburbs for a chosen province and navigates to their retailer listings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, implemented features, and pending feature requests for the Shop-only MVP.
